message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is worth significantly more than its face value. For a limited time, I'm willing to extend this exclusive opportunity to you at an exceptional price of $120. This is a unique chance to acquire a high-quality item at a fantastic deal. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding.

I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay a premium for a high-quality item, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. Can you meet me in the middle or consider a slightly lower price?
